name: Branch Of Sin: Gluttony
description:
It's have been so long, the world we know is no more, only people like you were left roaming the ruins aimlessly in a desprate search for answers, who  what are you, where are you going, why you always need to consume  devour.

this game is the first in a trilogy (GLUTTONY, WRATH, PRIDE) that will dive deeper and deeper into this sick world giving answers to the ones who desperately seek them.

For me (a solo dev) to be able to deliver the whole story I will need your help with it, I already started working on the second part and am counting on you who believe that am doing something special to support me throughout the process and even if you can't, the fact that you took time to read this is enough for me, so thank you.
